content: Is it possible to mute all streams in one step?

I'm not aware of a way to mute all streams in a single step - you can unsubscribe from streams so they aren't in your sidebar at all, and then mute them so that they have a muted appearance in the sidebar, and you can pin some to the top; but no way of doing any of that in bulk to multiple streams.
That's too bad - it would be nice if there were a one-click solution! I just clicked through all my streams
